actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Provisions of measure incorporated into measure S. 1846 ordered to be reported.

official_title: A bill to establish the amount of the costs of the Department of Energy's uranium enrichment program that have not previously been recovered from enrichment customers in the charges of the Department of Energy to its customers.

summary.text: Amends the Atomic Energy Act of 1954 to state that the Government's costs of providing uranium enrichment services that have not been recovered prior to FY 1987 amount to $364,000,000. Provides that such amount, with interest on the unpaid balance, will be covered in charges for services within a 20-year period commencing October 1, 1987.

titles.title: A bill to establish the amount of the costs of the Department of Energy's uranium enrichment program that have not previously been recovered from enrichment customers in the charges of the Department of Energy to its customers.
